name: merge_rosbags
short_description: Merge multiple rosbag files into a single file.
description: This Action merges multiple rosbag files into a single file. By default, all topics are extracted and merged, but you can specify an optional list of topics instead.

parameters.name: TOPICS
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of topics to be merged. If empty, all topics are merged

parameters.name: OUTPUT_FILE_NAME
parameters.description: Output bag name with merged topics

parameters.name: OUTPUT_FOLDER_NAME
parameters.description: Output folder path of merged bag file
